content: cringe she loves to hear from readers about how they would tweak her designs currently caretaker to 6 cats her husband has to cover her eyes when she sees neighborhood strays she lives by the motto dream bigger josi is wearing a hat she made from pippikneesocks hand-dyed hand-spun yarn about the editor julie armstrong holetz is a technical editor pattern writer teacher and author whose work has been published in several books and magazines she is the author of crochet away a contributing technical editor for interweave crochet and has appeared on diy network s series uncommon threads julie crochets and plays in and around seattle with her husband and two kids more about julie and her work can be found at her website skamama com www skamama com © 2007 josi hannon madera
